metadata.title: Home - Team Directory
metadata.description: Welcome to the Team Directory application

hero.title: Welcome to Team Directory
hero.description: Browse, search, and manage your team members with ease. Find the right person quickly with our powerful filtering and search capabilities.

search.title: Advanced Search
search.description: Search team members by name or email with real-time filtering and debounced input for optimal performance.

filter.title: Smart Filtering
filter.description: Filter team members by role (Admin, Agent, Creator) and combine multiple filters for precise results.

views.title: Multiple Views
views.description: Switch between table and grid views to see your team members in the format that works best for you.

filters.searchDescription: Start typing to find team members instantly
filters.noResultsHint: Try adjusting your search terms or filters

emptyState.title: No team members found
emptyState.filteredMessage: We couldn't find any matches. Try adjusting your search or filters to see more results.
emptyState.noDataMessage: Your team directory is being set up. Check back soon!

network.title: Connection Error

server.title: Server Error
server.message: We're experiencing some technical difficulties. Our team has been notified. Please try again in a moment.

unknown.title: Something went wrong
unknown.message: An unexpected hiccup occurred. Don't worry, we're on it! Please try again.

invalidParams.title: Invalid URL parameters
invalidParams.message: Some URL parameters were invalid and have been removed.
